job.command:
ln -s /star/u/wangzhen/run20/Dielectron_Common/minitree/.sl73_gcc485 ./.sl64_gcc447 ln -s /star/u/wangzhen/run20/Dielectron_Common/minitree/.sl73_gcc485 ./ ln -s /star/u/wangzhen/run20/Dielectron_Common/minitree/StRoot ./ ln -s /star/u/wangzhen/run20/Dielectron_Common/minitree/doEvent.C ./
